testsuite.name: com.kaiqkt.authentication.integration.web.OAuthIntegrationTest

testcase.name: given a request to authorize when user not found should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize based on code when code challenge not matches should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize when password does not match should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize should create a authorization code successfully()
given a request to introspect when access token has a invalid signature should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize based on refresh token when request is invalid thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize based on code when request is invalid thrown an exception()
given a request to introspect when access token has a invalid format should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize based on refresh token when not exist a session should thrown an exception()
given a request to introspect when session is expired and revoked should return the introspection data with active false()
iven a request to introspect when session is not expired and not revoked should return the introspection data with active true()
given a request to introspect when access token is expired should thrown an exception()
given a request to authorize based on refresh token should return a pair of tokens successfully()
given a request to authorize based on code should return a pair of tokens successfully()
given a request to authorize based on code should when code not exists thrown an exception()
